resources.string: Please choose your role:\nAre you a professor or a student?
"Class Detected!\nWould you like to check\ninto CLASS_NAME?"
"Class Detected!\nWould you like to start attendance\nfor CLASS_NAME?"

"DISCOVERING...

#WhereYouAtBro
Your device is searching for the
 host's device."

"ADVERTISING...

Beep.. Boop..
Your device is getting ready for
 attendees to find you."
